name: SUPER STICK II 2 METER
description:
SUPER STICK II 5/8 wave,  flexible base loaded telescopic antenna is the standard for field use whether in the countryside or city. It provides OMNI directional 6 to 9 db gain and is usable in 2 positions. Fully extended or fully collapsed. It is a true 1/4 wave when collapsed & 5/8 wave when extended. Modular construction features replaceable telescopic section, tuned coil/spring. This new flex coil matching network provides at band center low SWR as well as a +or – 5 MHz band center. Antenna tuned at 146.25 MHZ being the band center, the antenna will perform between 141-151 MHz. Length Telescope 10″ down and 48″ up.

Used item in very good condition. Please see photos.

Item tested and working.

Please note any test instruments and meters used to show functionality in photos are not included.
What you see in the photos that forms part of the accessories of the specific unit is included, nothing more.
All these pieces comes from working ham shacks as well as storage units and sold as is.
